content.prompt: Throughout the passage the writer wants to make sure to acknowledge sources used as evidence. Which of the following changes should the writer make?

choices.label: In sentence 1, changing “In 2016,” to “In a 2016 essay published by the World Economic Forum,”
In sentence 3, changing “artists” to “artists who work in diverse media such as painting, music, and performance art”
In sentence 8, changing “recontextualization” to “recontextualization, or repackaging,”

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
